alexcrichton opened issue #7430:

    sync::http_outbound_request_get

test result: FAILED. 23 passed; 1 failed; 0 ignored; 0 measured; 0 filtered out; finished in 66.67s

</details>

Currently only seen on MinGW in CI (Windows). Wasn't able to reproduce locally. I remember seeing this before in CI once but I don't have a link to it.
